intro:
Chapter Three : The realm of Yl'her

The realm of The Odd One was profoundly nested in the other
realms. It had no light nor darkness, and the wreckeds lied still.

Once again, the Chaos was called, and once again the Chaos
changed the realm. From the Th'liy's realm he borrowed the light,
and from the one of Cas'sacor the deep darkness.

The two did not melt, and never stop fighting one other.

The Chaos took also life from the Earth, and the wrecked gained
the Motion. When the Odd One checked the work of the Chaos, he
was pelased, and the Chaos and him reigned together on Yl'her.
indice1: Bite hurts. Yl'her moving under my feets.
indice2: Sand everywhere. Shiny, Shiny little sand.
flame: This crystal flame glows a deep bleu. I finaly found my own sun !
